TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it granted as a better wish!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You look great, and receive a compliment as well!

I wish I didn't think so much about my replies' structure.

You don't have to anymore. Perfect grammar and diction comes naturally to you like it did ol' Winston. 

Man, I wish my upcoming academic has enough downtime for KSP sessions.

Granted. In fact, you are selected to teach all the new KSP courses in your institution's curriculum, and are paid handsomely for it.

I wish my clothes didn't produce so much lint when I put them in the dryer.

Granted. They instead fill the lint trap with crisp, genuine $100 bills.

I wish for a new pair of sunglasses.

Granted, they're these: [http://jorge573.deviantart.com/art/Jason-Hudson-Black-Ops-2-316040551](http://jorge573.deviantart.com/art/Jason-Hudson-Black-Ops-2-316040551)

I wish for my own TARS
